meta.title: Mid-Century Modern
meta.description: Atomic age optimism meets organic warmth. Eames chairs, Nelson clocks, and the confident design of the 1950s-60s. Clean geometry softened by warm materials.

typography.principle: Geometric sans-serifs with personality. Clean but never cold - the friendly optimism of the atomic age.

font.name: DM Sans
font.note: Geometric sans with subtle humanist touches

font.name: Nunito Sans
font.note: Rounded terminals add warmth to geometric forms

font.name: Fraunces
font.usage: Accent text, pull quotes - adds vintage contrast
font.note: Soft serif with 'wonky' optical sizing for warmth

avoid.reason: Too generic - lacks the personality of the era

color.principle: Warm neutrals grounded by bold, confident accent colors. The palette of teak furniture, terrazzo floors, and optimistic futures.

color.name: walnut
color.description: Warm dark brown like oiled walnut

color.name: cream
color.description: Warm off-white - like vintage paper or plaster

color.name: tangerine

motion.principle: Confident, purposeful, with a playful bounce. Think Saul Bass title sequences - graphic, rhythmic, delightful.

animation.name: atomic-pop
animation.description: Elements pop in with slight overshoot - confident and playful
